title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Instruction for Understanding Elementary Mathematics Operational Properties

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concepts of commutative property, additive identity, and additive inverse with 85% or higher accuracy.
Learners can solve complex operation property problems (e.g., combined property problems) in VR simulations with 70% or higher accuracy.
Learners can verbally/textually explain the problem-solving process based on mathematical relational understanding
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
